Vedic Village Spa Resort is a hidden gem, nestled in the lap of nature just 20 minutes away from the international airport in Kolkata, India. Built horizontally in the authentic architecture of Bengal villages, the world-class luxury resort blends in completely with the uniqueness of the landscape. It combines tremendous natural beauty and outdoor fun with unbeatable indoor luxury. A boutique getaway sprawling over 18 acres of fertile farmland greenery, sparkling lakes, coconut groves and a wealth of flora; it is a haven for migratory birds, butterflies, squirrels and exotic species of plants.

A perfect destination for rejuvenating weekends, family vacations, corporate retreats and destination weddings.

A tranquil sanctuary with a unique ambience of tradition, art and nature on one hand and on the other with ample international style leisure,sports activities, wellness facilities.

Water bodies. Green pastures. Adventure. Spa. Bonfires. Sunsets. Boating. ATV Riding. Bowling Alley. Zorbing. Segaways. Kayaking… the list goes on!

A collection of exclusive hand-picked accommodation, with extraordinary villas and private homes, plus premium hotel rooms for those who expect excellent value, personal service and supremely comfortable accommodation.

Brilliant gourmet experiences await you at the award-winning regional cuisine restaurant or through farm to fork organic meals at the all-hour restaurant, or even through the simplicity of the rituals at the tea lounge. And for after hours there’s always the romantic poolside bar or the pulsating nightspot.

And finally, serenity awaits you at the private Sanjeeva Ayurvedic Spa. Only a short amble along the gardened pathways leads you to the temple of the wholistic wellness retreat… that starts the moment you check in!

Offering a spa center and an outdoor swimming pool, Vedic Village Spa Resort is located in Kolkata in the West Bengal Region. There is a bowling alley and a games room on site. Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site.

About hotel The Vedic Village, Kolkata

Rooms are equipped with a TV offering cable channels. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms come with a private bathroom with a and shower, with bath robes, slippers and free toiletries provided.

There is a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. The hotel features a fitness center, childrens playground and car hire options. Also offered are meeting/banquet facilities and a business center.

Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurants, followed by a drink at the bar. The property also offers room service and a gift shop.

Indian Museum is 701 m from Vedic Village Spa Resort, while Nandan is 801 m from the property. The nearest airport is Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Airport, 9.3 mi from the property.

Address: Shikharpur, P.O, Bagu, Newtown, Kolkata, West Bengal 700135
